review: I have Asthma problem for almost 11 year but for couple of years i had no symptoms and as  i m in Delhi for 2 months and this symptoms elevated  and I was hardly sleeping due to  regular coughing and breathing problem  but once I reached hospital she gave  first aid to give instant relief and good thing was that she was not in hurry she  properly diagnosed and did listen my problem patiently. I am really thankful to Dr,. Sumedha Narula   and MR Hospital .

During this epidemic period, i was afraid of corona. *** *** ****** ** ********* *** ***** All other doctos were refering me to govermnwt hospital, due to afraid of cornona. But she diagnosed and said this ia not corona but lower zone infection of lungs.*** ** * ***** ****** *** * ***** ******
